com.example.hivefrontend.ui.home

Class HomeFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.hivefrontend.ui.home.HomeFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, IHomeView

    public class HomeFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements IHomeView
    Fragment for leftmost tab on the bottom navigation, containing the home and discover tabs

      • clearData

        public void clearData()
        Clears the ArrayLists of posts, hive ids, and hive options for both the home and discover tab. Called before a request to get the data again to update any changed data.
        Specified by:
        clearData in interface IHomeView

      • sortPosts

        public void sortPosts()
        Using the PostComparator, sorts the home and discover posts chronologically. Newer posts will appear on top.
        Specified by:
        sortPosts in interface IHomeView
